title: About | SAIL Blog
content: The Stanford AI Lab (SAIL) Blog is a place for SAIL students, faculty, and researchers to share our work with the general public. We will write about our latest research, discussions and talks held at SAIL, and other interesting updates from our labs. To learn more about the various AI research being done at SAIL, visit the SAIL website. ContributingPeople at SAIL interested in contributing can look here for instructions. TeamAll our blog posts are written by members in the SAIL community, with faculty advisor Dorsa Sadigh and the following editorial board: AlumniWe thank these former editors for their work on the SAIL Blog: © 2021 Stanford AI Lab
